long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspect GraphQL and raw HTTP requests/responses like a Boss ðŸ˜Ž

â˜… Querio intercepts and displays GraphQL, Fetch and XHR requests in a nicer and more dev-friendly way than the built-in Network inspector
â˜… Each request made on the page is beautifully formatted and highlighted
â˜… Filter by request type and search by GraphQL query/mutation name
â˜… Dark and Light themes
